definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="play_newgeckoanim"><field name="name">CUSTOM:Searcher</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="animation"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">animation.model.rise</field></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:searcher_appear</field><field name="soundcategory">hostile</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_set_movement"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="vx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value><value name="vy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="vz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="move_entity"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
